topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c4776d63687253d0af1000#post_54c4776d63687253d0af1000
I will say this though; if you want to check out the music you will be blown the ***** away with a **** on a **** towards **** with ***** under a **** cause holy shit is touhou music and fan music fucking amazing.  Even though the game music MIDI it blows even AAA mainstream music out of the fucking water with a depthcharge.  One of the hardest questions you can ask any touhou fan is to name their top favorite songs; it's just impossible cause the music will rock your face clean off.  To put it in perspective every year gaku and all the touhoutards update a list of best music in the touhou fandom and uploads them to torrents and such all organized and rated; the folder for things rate 9.5 out of 10 or above when I tried to download it was like 1.2 terabytes and the entire torrent was like 140 terabytes.  To put that in perspective that's *23 YEARS* worth of music.
